contents:
blog_admin:
    # Whether to show the blog config entry in the menu or not
    show_config_entry: true
    # Whether to show the menus config entry in the menu or not
    show_menu_entry: true
    # Whether to show the pages entry in the menu or not
    show_pages_entry: true
    # Whether to show the blog entry in the menu or not
    show_blog_entry: true
    # The name of the main content menu entry
    blog_entry_label: 'menu.blog'
    # Whether to have an author for the posts or not
    enable_post_authors: false
    # Here you can list the codes of the pages that cannot be deleted
    permanent_pages: ['about_us']
    # Here you can list the codes of the menus that cannot be deleted
    permanent_menu_entries: ['main', 'footer']
    # The number of posts to show per page
    posts_per_page: 10
